works.description:
I am Vinod Lahoti , producer of the
Feature Film CHATRAK directed by Vimukthi Jayasundara.

My address - 40/3, Strand Road, Kolkata - 700001, West Bengal, India.


Our movie has been screend at international film festivals including
Cannes,Toronto,Seoul and Vladivosto and is widely acclaimed
under Internatonal fraternity.
Some unscrupulous persons are trying to harm our business.

Our uncut and unedited video has been got leaked. It's creating hatred for


our movie in large scale.

please disable sites as stated under Location of infringing material to
appear in google search as they are related to our movie chatrak and paoli


dam.

Your prompt action will be highly appreciated.



Regards,


Vinod Lahoti

+919831274736

   Producer
